scene
Class Scene

java.lang.Object
  sceneObjects.SceneObject
      scene.Scene
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISceneObject
public class Scene
extends SceneObject

This class represents a scene and holds all the objects.

getSL

public double getSL(IRay ray,
                    ILight light,
                    Intersection hitPoint)
Returns 0 if the given ray from a hit point to a light source intersects with other objects (blocked), or 1 otherwise (not blocked).

Parameters:
ray - A ray from the hitPoint to a light source.
light - The light source.
hitPoint - The hit point which originates the ray.
Returns:
0 if the given ray from a hit point to a light source intersects with other objects (blocked), or 1 otherwise (not blocked).
